Attributes.description: Pipeline materials and material selection; fracture mechanics; manufacturing and processing; welding and corrosion; soil-pipe interactions; surveying and site investigations; slope stability; natural hazards; pipeline loads and response.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) MECH 221 or (b) APSC 278 and one of CIVL 215, MTRL 263 and one of CIVL 230, MECH 260.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 13:00, Building: MacMillan, Room: 256
